iniShootDM.description: Initial shoot dry matter weight for the species to be simulated (kgDM/ha)

iniRootDM.description: Initial root dry matter weight for the species to be simulated (kgDM/ha)

iniRootDepth.description: Initial rooting depth for species to be simulated (mm)

isLegume.description: Whether the species is legume (no=0, yes=1)

Pm.description: Reference photosynthesis rate - leaf C assimilation (mg CO2/m2.s)

growthEfficiency.description: Growth efficiency factor - photosynthesis minus growth respiration (0-1)

growthTq.description: Curve parameter for growth response to temperature

useHeatStress.description: whether heat stress function will be used

heatOnsetT.description: Onset temperature for heat effects on growth (oC)

heatFullT.description: Temperature for full heat effects on growth (oC)

heatSumT.description: Temperature sum for recovery from heat effects (oC)

heatRecoverT.description: Base temperature for recovery from heat stress (oC)

useColdStress.description: whether cold stress function will be used

coldOnsetT.description: Onset temperature for cold effects on growth (oC)

coldFullT.description: Temperature for full cold effects on growth (oC)

coldSumT.description: Temperature sum for recovery from cold effects (oC)

coldRecoverT.description: Base temperature for recovery from cold effects (oC)

referenceCO2.description: Reference atmospheric CO2 content for photosynthesis (ppm)

CO2PmaxScale.description: Scale factor for CO2 effect on photosynthesis (ppm)

CO2NScale.description: Scale factor for CO2 effects on plant N concentration (ppm)

CO2NMin.description: Minimum reduction of plant N concentration under elevated CO2 (0-1)

CO2NCurvature.description: Curvature factor of CO2 effect on plant N concentration

maxRootFraction.description: Maximum biomass fraction allocated to roots (0-1)

allocationSeasonF.description: Factor for increasing DM allocation to shoot during reproductive growth (0-1)

StartHighAllocation.description: Day for starting the period with higher DM allocation to shoot

DurationHighAllocation.description: Duration of main phase for higher DM allocation to shoot (days)

ShoulderHighAllocation.description: Relative duration of shoulder periods for higher shoot allocation (0-1)

useLatitudeFunction.description: Whether DM allocation (shoot/root) will be adjusted using latitude (yes/no)

ReferenceLatitude.description: Reference latitude, beyond which DM allocation is hardly affected (degrees)

paramALatFunction.description: Exponent of function for defining the start of period with high allocation to shoot (>1.0)

onsetFacLatFunction.description: Define the duration of onset phase with high allocation, fraction of main phase (0-1)

outsetFacLatFunction.description: Define the duration of outset phase with high allocation, fraction of main phase (0-1)

maxShoulderLatFunction.description: Maximum duration of the shoulder phases with high DM allocation (days)

minPlateauLatFunction.description: Minimum duration of main phase (plateau) with high DM allocation (days)

paramBLatFunction.description: Exponent of function defining the duration of main phase with high allocation

allocationMax.description: Maximum increase in DM allocation to shoot during reproductive growth (0-1)

paramCLatFunction.description: Exponent of function defining the variations in the increase of DM fraction allocated to shoot (>1.0)

fLeaf.description: Fraction of new shoot growth allocated to leaves (0-1)

fStolon.description: Fraction of new shoot growth allocated to stolons (0-1)

SpecificLeafArea.description: Specific leaf area, per dry matter weight (m2/kgDM)

SpecificRootLength.description: Specific root length, per dry matter weight (m/gDM)

rateLive2Dead.description: Reference senescence rate for shoot - live to dead tissue (0-1)

rateDead2Litter.description: Reference littering rate - dead tissue to litter (0-1)

massFluxTq.description: Exponent of function for temperature effect on tissue turnover

massFluxW0.description: Scale factor for response of DM turnover to soil moisture (>1.0)

stockParameter.description: Parameter for stock influence on tissue senescence

Kappa2_Remob.description: Coefficient for remobilisation of luxury N from tissue2 (0-1)

Kappa3_Remob.description: Coefficient for remobilisation of luxury N from tissue3 (0-1)

Kappa4_Remob.description: Coefficient for partitioning non-used Nremob into tissue4 (0-1)

dmroot.description: Initial root dry matter weight - if negative, start value is calculated (kgDM/ha)

dmgreenmin.description: Minimum allowable green dry matter weight (kgDM/ha)

dmdeadmin.description: Minimum allowable dead dry matter weight (kgDM/ha)

initialDMFractions_grass.description: Fractions of initial dmshoot for each biomass pool, for grasses

initialDMFractions_legume.description: Fractions of initial dmshoot for each biomass pool, for legumes

NconcOptimum_leaves.description: Optimum N concentration of young leaves (%)

NconcMaximum_leaves.description: Maximum N concentration in leaves, with luxury uptake (%)

NconcMinimum_leaves.description: Minimum N concentration in leaves, at senescence (%])

RelativeNconc_Stems.description: Relative N concentration in stems, fraction of leaf N (0-1)

RelativeNconc_Stolons.description: Relative N concentration in stolons, fraction of leaf N (0-1)

RelativeNconc_Roots.description: Relative N concentration in roots, fraction of leaf N (0-1)

RelativeNconc_stage2.description: Optimum N concentration for tissue2 (mature), relative to tissue1 (0-1)

RelativeNconc_stage3.description: Optimum N concentration for tissue3 (senescing), relative to tissue1 (0-1)

NMinFix.description: Minimum fraction of N demand fixed by legumes (when N in soil is sufficient) (0-1)

NMaxFix.description: Maximum fraction of N demand fixed by legumes (when N in soil is absent) (0-1)

NdilutCoeff.description: Coefficient for modifying the effect of N stress on plant growth (0-1)

waterStressFactor.description: coefficient for modifying the effect of water stress on plant growth (0-1)

soilSatFactor.description: Coefficient for growth limitations due to soil moisture saturation (0-1)

RootDistributionMethod.description: Method used to compute root distribution over soil profile

ExpoLinearDepthParam.description: Fraction of root depth where its proportion starts to decrease (0-1)

ExpoLinearCurveParam.description: Parameter for ExpoLinear method, exponent to determine mass distribution in the soil profile

rlvp.description: Root length density proportion, relative (to be deprecated)

ll.description: Lower limit moisture for water uptake by this species

kl.description: Coefficient for water availability for each soil layer

xf.description: Exploration factor, fraction of layer resources available to plant

WaterUptakeSource.description: Whether water uptake is calculated by AgPasture (calc) or apsim

NUptakeSource.description: Whether N uptake is calculated by AgPasture (calc) or apsim

PreferenceForGreenDM.description: Weight factor defining the preference level for green DM

PreferenceForDeadDM.description: Weight factor defining the preference level for dead DM

LinearInterpolation.name: HeightMassFN
LinearInterpolation.description: Pair-wise description of the relationship between height and DM

LinearInterpolation.name: FVPDFunction
LinearInterpolation.description: Pair-wise description of the growth limiting factor due to vapour pressure deficit
